link.title: ðŸ’° KASH Issuance, Reward, and Stabilization Mechanism
link.description: KASH is a reserve token issued with real asset-based RWA (vRWA or RWA(Gold)) as collateral and has mechanisms to maintain its intrinsic value based on early risk rewards and collateral.
